SELECT Z.USER_UUID as userUuid, Z.USER_ID as userId, Z.USER_NAME as userNm, Z.PASSWORD as userPassword, Z.PASSWORD_UPDATE_DATE as passwordUpdateDate, Z.USER_TYPE_UUID as userTypeUuid, Z.START_PROGRAM_UUID startProgramUuid, (SELECT PROGRAM_NAME FROM AD_PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAM_UUID = Z.START_PROGRAM_UUID)as startProgramName, Z.ORGANIZATION_UUID organizationUuid, Z.DESCRIPTION description, Z.NOTES notes, Z.USE_YN useYn,
as insertUuid, Z.INSERT_DATE as insertDate,
as updateUuid, Z.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM AC_USER Z
Z.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{userId} || '%'
AND Z.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{userNm} || '%'
AND Z.USER_TYPE_UUID = #{userTypeUuid}
AND Z.USE_YN = #{useYn}

SELECT DISTINCT Z1.ACCESS_CONTROL_UUID as accessControlUuid, Z1.USER_UUID as userUuid, Z1.USER_GROUP_UUID as userGroupUuid, Z1.ROLE_UUID as roleUuid, Z2.ROLE_NAME as roleName, Z1.DESCRIPTION as description, Z1.NOTES as notes, Z1.USE_YN as useYn,
as insertUuid, Z1.INSERT_DATE insertDate,
as updateUuid, Z1.UPDATE_DATE updateDate FROM AC_ACCESS_CONTROL Z1, AC_ROLE Z2 WHERE Z1.ROLE_UUID = Z2.ROLE_UUID
AND Z1.USER_UUID = #{userUuid}
